verses.verse: וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> ve-Zot likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> to-Rat Likewise this [is] the law הָאָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> ha-'a-Sham; of the trespass offering קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> ka-da-Shim holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

בִּמְק֗וֹם <WH4725> bim-Kom, In the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher where יִשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <WH7819> yish-cha-Tu where they kill אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah, the burnt offering יִשְׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> yish-cha-Tu shall they kill אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> ha-'a-Sham; the trespass offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et דָּמ֛וֹ <WH1818> da-Mo and the blood יִזְרֹ֥ק <WH2236> yiz-Rok thereof shall he sprinkle עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חֶלְבּ֖וֹ <WH2459> chel-Bo of it all the fat יַקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> yak-Riv And he shall offer מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu; at אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et הָֽאַלְיָ֔ה <WH451> ha-'al-Yah, thereof the rump וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> ha-Che-lev and the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> ham-chas-Seh that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev. the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot, kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> ha-Che-lev and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hen, is on אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <WH3689> hak-ke-sa-Lim; that [is] on them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> hak-ka-Ved, [that is] above the liver עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5493> ye-si-Ren-nah. it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִ֨יר <WH6999> ve-hik-Tir shall burn אֹתָ֤ם <WH853> 'o-Tam הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah, them upon the altar אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh [for] an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> 'a-Sham it [is] a trespass offering הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- Every זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> za-Char Every male בַּכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> bak-ko-ha-Nim among the priests יֹאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> yo-che-Len-nu; shall eat בְּמָק֤וֹם <WH4725> be-ma-Kom place קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> ka-do-Vosh in the holy יֵאָכֵ֔ל <WH398> ye-'a-Chel, thereof it shall be eaten קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> ka-da-Shim holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

כַּֽחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> ka-chat-taT As the sin offering כָּֽאָשָׁ֔ם <WH817> ka-'a-Sham, [is] so [is] the trespass offering תּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> to-Rah law אַחַ֖ת <WH259> 'a-Chat [there is] one לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen for them the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יְכַפֶּר־ <WH3722> ye-chap-per- that maketh atonement בּ֖וֹ bo ל֥וֹ lo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> yih-Yeh. shall have

וְהַ֨כֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> ve-Hak-ko-Hen, And the priest הַמַּקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> ham-mak-Riv that offereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֹ֣לַת <WH5930> 'O-lat burnt offering אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; any man's ע֤וֹר <WH5785> or shall have to himself the skin הָֽעֹלָה֙ <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הִקְרִ֔יב <WH7126> hik-Riv, which he hath offered לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> lak-ko-Hen [even] the priest ל֥וֹ lo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> yih-Yeh. shall have

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol every מִנְחָ֗ה <WH4503> min-Chah, And all the meat offering אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher is תֵּֽאָפֶה֙ <WH644> te-'a-Peh that is baken בַּתַּנּ֔וּר <WH8574> bat-tan-Nur, in the oven וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and everything נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> na-'a-Sah and all that is dressed בַמַּרְחֶ֖שֶׁת <WH4227> vam-mar-Che-shet and in the pan וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- in מַחֲבַ֑ת <WH4802> ma-cha-Vat; in the fryingpan לַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> lak-ko-Hen shall be the priest's הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> ham-mak-Riv that offereth אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah ל֥וֹ lo תִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> Tih-Yeh. shall belong

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol Every מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> min-Chah And every meat offering בְלוּלָֽה־ <WH1101> ve-lu-lah- mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> vash-She-men with oil וַחֲרֵבָ֑ה <WH2720> va-cha-re-Vah; and dry לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> be-Nei shall all the sons אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron תִּהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh shall belong אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish have one כְּאָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> ke-'a-Chiv. [as much] as another פ Peh

וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> ve-Zot likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> to-Rat And this [is] the law זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> hash-she-la-Mim; of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> yak-Riv which he shall offer לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

אִ֣ם <WH518> 'im If עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- way תּוֹדָה֮ <WH8426> to-Dah it for a thanksgiving יַקְרִיבֶנּוּ֒ <WH7126> yak-ri-ven-Nu If he offer וְהִקְרִ֣יב׀ <WH7126> ve-hik-Riv then he shall offer עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach with the sacrifice הַתּוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> hat-to-Dah, of thanksgiving חַלּ֤וֹת <WH2471> chal-Lot cakes מַצּוֹת֙ <WH4682> matz-tzOt unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <WH1101> be-lu-Lot mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> bash-She-men, with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <WH7550> u-re-ki-Kei wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot and unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <WH4886> me-shu-Chim anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> bash-Sha-men; with oil וְסֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> ve-So-let of fine flour מֻרְבֶּ֔כֶת <WH7246> mur-Be-chet, fried חַלֹּ֖ת <WH2471> chal-Lot and cakes בְּלוּלֹ֥ת <WH1101> be-lu-Lot mingled בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> bash-Sha-men. with oil

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with חַלֹּת֙ <WH2471> chal-Lot Besides the cakes לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread חָמֵ֔ץ <WH2557> cha-Metz, leavened יַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> yak-Riv he shall offer קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No; [for] his offering עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with זֶ֖בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach with the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֥ת <WH8426> to-Dat of thanksgiving שְׁלָמָֽיו׃ <WH8002> she-la-Mav. of his peace offerings

וּבְשַׂ֗ר <WH1320> u-ve-Sar, And the flesh זֶ֚בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach of the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֣ת <WH8426> to-Dat for thanksgiving שְׁלָמָ֔יו <WH8002> she-la-Mav, of his peace offerings בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom the same day קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No that it is offered יֵאָכֵ֑ל <WH398> ye-'a-Chel; shall be eaten לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not יַנִּ֥יחַ <WH3240> yan-Ni-ach he shall not leave מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu any עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> Bo-ker. any of it until the morning

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if נֶ֣דֶר׀ <WH5088> Ne-der [be] a vow א֣וֹ <WH176> o or נְדָבָ֗ה <WH5071> ne-da-Vah, or a voluntary offering זֶ֚בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach But if the sacrifice קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No, of his offering בְּי֛וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom the same day הַקְרִיב֥וֹ <WH7126> hak-ri-Vo that he offereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זִבְח֖וֹ <WH2077> ziv-Cho his sacrifice יֵאָכֵ֑ל <WH398> ye-'a-Chel; it shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> u-mi-mo-cho-Rat, and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָ֥ר <WH3498> ve-han-no-Tar also the remainder מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu of it יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <WH398> ye-'a-Chel. of it shall be eaten

וְאִ֣ם <WH518> ve-'Im if הֵאָכֹ֣ל <WH3605> he-'a-Chol all manner יֵ֠אָכֵל <WH398> Ye-'a-chel be eaten מִבְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> mib-be-sar- And if [any] of the flesh זֶ֨בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach of the sacrifice שְׁלָמָ֜יו <WH8002> she-la-Mav of his peace offerings בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֮ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi on the third לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יֵרָצֶה֒ <WH7521> ye-ra-Tzeh it shall not be accepted הַמַּקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> ham-mak-Riv unto him that offereth אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> o-To, לֹ֧א <WH3808> lo it יֵחָשֵׁ֛ב <WH2803> ye-cha-Shev neither shall it be imputed ל֖וֹ lo פִּגּ֣וּל <WH6292> pig-Gul it it shall be an abomination יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh; become וְהַנֶּ֛פֶשׁ <WH5315> ve-han-Ne-fesh and the soul הָאֹכֶ֥לֶת <WH398> ha-'o-Che-let at all מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu any עֲוֹנָ֥הּ <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nah his iniquity תִּשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> tis-Sa. of it shall bear

וְהַבָּשָׂ֞ר <WH1320> ve-hab-ba-Sar And the flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- that יִגַּ֤ע <WH5060> yig-Ga' that toucheth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol anything טָמֵא֙ <WH2931> ta-Me any unclean לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <WH398> ye-'a-Chel, [thing] shall not be eaten בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh with fire יִשָּׂרֵ֑ף <WH8313> yis-sa-Ref; it shall be burnt וְהַ֨בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> ve-Hab-ba-Sar, and as for the flesh כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- anyone טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor all that be clean יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> yo-Chal shall eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> ba-Sar. flesh
